short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple color dropper tool for designers and developers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Dropper lets you quickly pick any color from web pages and apps. It will give you the hex code of the color and you can copy it to your clipboard. Simple, easy, and free eyedropper tool.

NOTE: Color Dropper does not work on the Chrome extensions page, so navigate to another website to test it!
